h2.style: font-size: 30px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0px 0px 15px; text-align: center;

h1.style: font-size: 30px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0px 0px 15px; text-align: center;
h1.span: Welcome to Madison District Public Schools Website!

div.style: position: fixed; z-index: 1499; width: 0px; height: 0px;
all: initial;

p.span: I hope that everyone had a wonderful spring break and a beautiful Easter week. We have been busy working on a Continuity Plan for our district for the remainder of the school year.
I would like to update everyone on the efforts being undertaken by Madison District Public Schools during this prolonged COVID-19 pandemic closure.

span.span: There have been many great things going on in our community despite Governor Whitmer’s Stay Home, Stay Safe order. Please check out our social media pages on

span.style: padding: 0in; border: 1pt none windowtext; text-decoration: underline;
padding: 0in; border: 1pt none windowtext; text-decoration: underline;
padding: 0in; border: 1pt none windowtext; text-decoration: underline; font-family: Tahoma; color: black;

span.span: where some of these activities are being shared.

Several weeks ago, we learned that students in Michigan will not be returning to school for live instruction for the remainder of this academic school year. We currently finalized and submitted our Continuity of Learning Plan (CLP), which was approved by Oakland Schools on Monday April 13, 2020.

We started the work of that plan on March 16th, which we called our Enrichment and Enhancement plan. Our Phase 2 plan will begin with a two-day device deployment roll out for April 13 and April 14. Our Phase 2 Plan provides parents, and students further guidance of what instruction looks like for the remainder of the school year.

p.span: Our building principals will shortly roll out several phone calls and website updates regarding individualized plans for each specific building. Our district website will also share key features of our plan along with links that will help guide student learning.
Please see the links below to individual program and building plans.

a.span: Madison District Public Schools Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan

span.a: Continuity of Learning Plan Approval Letter

span.style: padding: 0in; border: 1pt none windowtext; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

span.span: Our meal distribution program will continue through the end of the school year, June 13, 2020. Current distribution is Monday and Thursday, 11:00 AM – 1:00 PM at Madison High School and 11:00 AM – 1:00 PM at New Bethel Church in Pontiac. We have already served over 22,400 meals since the beginning of this pandemic and we will continue feeding our families though the end of the school year.

p.span: While these times are difficult, we will get through them if we but endure and continue to work together. Thank you to everyone who has gone above and beyond to ensure that our students are safe and healthy.

td.div: Donations Needed for Local Diaper Bank
Please help support city of Madison Heights' local diaper drive. more about Donations Needed for Local Diaper Bank

div.style: position: fixed; z-index: 1499; width: 0px; height: 0px;
all: initial;

span.style: font-size: large; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0); color: rgb(112, 48, 160);

div.style: border-width: 0px; position: absolute; overflow: hidden; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; left: 3px; top: 127px; width: 1px; height: 1px;

box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; display: flex; flex-direction: column; min-width: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; background-clip: border-box; border: 1px solid rgb(224, 224, 224); border-radius: 0.25rem; height: auto; font-family: "Open Sans", apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, "Segoe UI", "Helvetica Neue", arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; margin-bottom: 1rem !important;

box-sizing: border-box; flex: 1 1 auto; min-height: 1px; padding: 1rem; background-image: initial !important; background-position: initial !important; background-size: initial !important; background-repeat: initial !important; background-attachment: initial !important; background-origin: initial !important; background-clip: initial !important;
box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; margin-right: -15px; margin-left: -15px;
box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; width: 870.156px; padding-right: 15px; padding-left: 15px; flex-basis: 0px; flex-grow: 1; max-width: 100%;

p.span: Practice and reinforce good prevention habits with your family

ul.li: Avoid close contact with people who are sick.
Cover your cough or sneeze with a tissue, then throw the tissue in the trash.

Wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the bathroom; before eating; and after blowing your nose, coughing, or sneezing. If soap and water are not readily available, use a hand sanitizer that contains at least 60% alcohol.

div.style: box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; display: flex; flex-direction: column; min-width: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; background-clip: border-box; border: 1px solid rgb(224, 224, 224); border-radius: 0.25rem; height: auto; font-family: "Open Sans", apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, "Segoe UI", "Helvetica Neue", arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; margin-bottom: 1rem !important;

div.style: box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; width: 870.156px; padding-right: 15px; padding-left: 15px; flex-basis: 0px; flex-grow: 1; max-width: 100%;

p.span: Keep your child at home if sick with any illness

div.p: If your child is sick, keep them at home and contact your healthcare provider. Talk with teachers about classroom assignments and activities they can do from home to keep up with their schoolwork.

em.span: Be prepared if your child’s school or childcare facility is temporarily dismissed

div.p: Talk with your employer about sick leave and telework options in case you need to stay home with your child. Consider planning for alternate childcare arrangements.

h3.style: font-size: 26px; border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(255, 219, 73); margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-family: lusitanaregular; font-weight: normal; padding-bottom: 5px;

strong.span: Please click on the links below to see employment opportunities with the district. Choose ​Search by District​ and select ​Madison District Public Schools:

h3.style: font-size: 26px; border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(255, 219, 73); margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-family: lusitanaregular; font-weight: normal; padding-bottom: 5px;

div.div: If any individual had difficulty accessing the information on any page of the District's website, they are encouraged to contact the District's Web Accessibility Coordinator and advise accordingly. Upon notification, the District will provide the requested information in an alternate format and, as soon as reasonable practical, make the necessary improvements to make the information accessible online.
26550 John R Rd, Madison Heights, MI 48071

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
